I'm a PhD student at the [University of Birmingham](http://www.birmingham.ac.uk/index.aspx)'s [School of Psychology](https://www.birmingham.ac.uk/schools/psychology/index.aspx).

I am supervised by [Dr Robin Thompson](https://www.birmingham.ac.uk/schools/psychology/people/profile.aspx?ReferenceId=71086) in the [Multimodal Multilingual Language Processing Lab](https://m2l2lab.com).

My postgraduate study is funded by 1+3 studentship from the [ESRC (Economic and Social Research Council)](https://esrc.ukri.org/).
